execute

public void execute(Engine engine,

Description copied from interface: Node
Performs Node specific logic. Either from the execute method, or later from outside, the Engine.completeExecution(NodeToken, String) method must be called to continue executing the GraphProcess.

Specified by:
execute in interface Node
Overrides:
execute in class HibNode
Parameters:
engine - The Engine which is performing the execution.
token - The NodeToken which is currently executing in this node.
